page.title: Reports: Prosecutors, CA Reach Accord
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - The U.S. Justice Department has agreed to defer prosecution of Computer Associates International Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=CA.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">CA.N</A> in its long-running investigation of accounting fraud at the software maker, several publications reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources.
